buffs.description: Increases Undead Tribe Friendliness. 40 for every 5-star and 80 for every 6-star. Effects are applied even when the unit is in Time Shop. The Tribe Friendliness increased by the Devil Mage cannot exceed 1,000.
buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness (Undead)

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against magical attacks.
Increases movement speed of self by 10% and attack range by 10%.
Increases the movement speed and attack range of all units by 6% and attack by 8%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Tribe Friendliness for Undead can be increased up to 1,500 by Devil Mage.

Increase Efficiency for Token Enhancement (Undead): The efficiency for Token Enhancement (Undead) is increased. Increase Tribe Friendliness by 40 for each 5-star, 100 for each 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop.
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Devil Mage ]
